name: memoize-one

0.0.1-beta.name: memoize-one
0.0.1-beta.description: A memoization library for memoizing a function with a cache size of one

scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run typecheck && yarn run test:fast
scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:flow
scripts.coverage: yarn run coverage:analyise && yarn run coverage:report && yarn run coverage:publish
